question:
A restaurant has placed an advertisement for waiters and waitresses in your local newspaper.

Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:

explain what you are currently doing
describe your suitability for this area of work
say when you can attend an interview
text: I read about a job vacancy in the post of a waiter in your restaurant ‘Starbucks’ through a local newspaper. I am looking forward to applying for the post and hereby attaching my resume for your reference.

I am currently pursuing a master's in Psychology, and plan to work with your restaurant to gain some experience. Also, during my free time, I take baking classes for pastries and cakes, and I am very passionate about it.

I believe I am suitable for this job because studying Psychology has taught me how one should interact with clients which will be helpful. I am a very friendly person and have good interpersonal as well as communication skills that are required in this work. Further, I speak 4 languages fluently. Considering the area, I believe that a lot of Gujarati crowd comes to the restaurant, so I will have no problem in striking a conversation. The restaurant is 5 minutes away from my house and it will be extremely convenient.
I can come for the interview tomorrow or at a time of your convenience. I am looking forward to your response.
